20181118.description: Trying to get simple websocket proxy working

t4.description: Combined effort from Wotan and Heimdall to make sure data can be passed between them properly.

20181119.description: Managed to get the proxy working

t4.description: runserver. Two things to note: the headers for the csrf cookie and the content type and length

children.csrf: Both the 'Cookie' and 'X-CSRFToken' headers need to be included in the post request. The value is fetched by making a GET request initially.
children.content: Both the 'Content-Type' and 'Content-Length' headers must be set. The content length is equal to the stringified length of the payload. The content type is obviously 'application/json', but it could be text as well for this purpose.
